name: LTD VINYL BUNDLE BARGAIN
description:
Something old, something new...
--- THIS --- 
When Superstar signed with SBK/EMI in America they did a mock seven inch single on "Superstar Records" to release to radio/media etc. The single includes tracks "Could It Be You" b/w "Destiny Boots" and I have just found a few unopened boxes of the single in my garage.
All singles are new/mint/unplayed.
Sleeve by artist and friend Jim Lambie.
These singles are very limited - once they're gone they are gone!!
--- PLUS THIS ---
Joe's latest LP on Edwyn Collins & James Endeacott's AED Records, this beautiful vinyl 10 track album produced by Edwyn Collins & Seb Lewsley, resplendent in Jim Lambie artwork, comes with full CD version of the album and is SIGNED BY JOE...
(AED0009LP)

Here’s a quick round up of the press so far for Bleached Highlights…
Album of the Week - Scotland On Sunday
“A beautiful record” 4/5 - Q Magazine
Album of the Week - Alexis Petridis The Guardian
“Beautifully assured” - The Scotsman
“This album is stunning” - Daily Record
Album of the Week - Vic Galloway BBC Radio Scotland
Album of the Week - Tom Morton BBC Radio Scotland
“Perfect pop moment” 4/5 - Sunday Express
“Glorious… A prime contender for Scottish Album of The Year” - The Sun

name: SUPERSTAR unreleased 7inch single from 1994 *NEW*
description:
When Superstar signed with SBK/EMI in America they did a mock seven inch single on "Superstar Records" to release to radio/media etc. The single includes tracks "Could It Be You" b/w "Destiny Boots" and I have just found a few unopened boxes of the single in my garage.
All singles are new/mint/unplayed.
Sleeve by artist and friend Jim Lambie.
These singles are very limited - once they're gone they are gone!!

name: Linden - Bleached Highlights SIGNED Vinyl Edition with CD Album
description:
Released at the beginning of August 2012 on Edwyn Collins & James Endeacott's AED Records, this beautiful vinyl 10 track album, resplendent in Jim Lambie artwork, comes with full CD version of the album and is SIGNED BY JOE...
(AED0009LP)
Here’s a quick round up of the press so far for Bleached Highlights…

name: Linden T-shirt in black with white logo
description:
BRAND NEW JUST IN Linden tees in black with white logo.
Jim Lambie design and printed in Glasgow on 100% pre-shrunk cotton.
Other colours available -  red/white, sky blue/black and white/black.
They look cool!

name: Linden - Button badges (set of two)
description: Great wee button badges come in a lucky dip set of two (if you'd like two particular badges please specify when ordering)... Just the ticket for the more discrete fan!

name: JUNE SPECIAL OFFER - Vinyl Bundle  *SOLD OUT*
description:
To commemorate the month of my birth, you can buy Bleached Highlights LP, If I Had Wings/Brown Bird Singing 7inch single AND get the album on CD for only £18.00 plus p&p.
*THIS OFFER IS AVAILABLE UNTIL THE END OF JUNE*

Here’s a quick round up of the press so far for Bleached Highlights…

name: Linden - If I Had Wings SIGNED 7' Single *SOLD OUT*
description:
Beautiful seven inch single & postcard  SIGNED BY JOE featuring two tracks from critically acclaimed album "Bleached Highlights" - If I Had Wings and Brown Bird Singing.
The postcard features Vortex (Soul Makossa 2012) by artist Jim Lambie.
Released on Edwyn Collins & James Endeacott's AED Records, the 45 was recorded at West Heath Yard in London and produced by Edwyn Collins & Seb Lewsley.
(AED0004)

name: Linden - Bleached Highlights SIGNED CD *SOLD OUT*
description:
